Package com.github.moribund.graphics.drawables

This package contains the interfaces for drawing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    A {code Drawable} object is an object that has a Sprite that is visible to the Screen.
    DrawableGameAsset
    A DrawableGameAsset is a game asset that is drawn with respect to the Orthographic camera.
    DrawableUIAsset
    A DrawableUIAsset is a UI asset that is drawn with respect to the client's bounds.

Package com.github.moribund.graphics.drawables Description

This package contains the interfaces for drawing.
